title: Tagged as leaver even though it wasnt my fault
body: I decided to play ranked and when the game started I got stuck on 80% loading and a minute or two later the client closes and says that I left the game and I got tagged as a leaver and it made me lose a match for my series. Why am I tagged as a leaver when I never even connected to the game in the first place??? Its not my internet that is the problem I was at a constant 47 ping and the client wasnt broken either the circle at the bottom right kept loading except it didnt load me into a game. This happened the game before only it was a normal and now it happened again in a ranked and it made me take a loss for it. Why is it set up like this??? How come I am made to lose a game in my series and put on a low priority queue when I never even connected to the game to begin with

replies.body: You might be having a connection issue that's failing to get you into the game.  The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system would only apply if you've had a history of leaves and not just 1 game.  Even if you didn't mean to leave, it will treat everyone equally because all leaves cause a negative experience for others.  You'll want to go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot, and test it in a custom game.  Let me know if that clears things up.
